scripts.deploy: sam deploy --template-file ../packaged.yaml --stack-name $Stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides BrokerURI=$BrokerURI BrokerKey=$BrokerKey BrokerSecret=$BrokerSecret BotUserToken=$BotUserToken SlackSigningSecret=$SlackSigningSecret DialogflowProjectId=$DialogflowProjectId GoogleApplicationCredentialsFilename=$GoogleApplicationCredentialsFilename GoogleCseId=$GoogleCseId GoogleCseApiKey=$GoogleCseApiKey IntentIdChangeColor=$IntentIdChangeColor CumulusCommandTopic=$CumulusCommandTopic
